name: Indoor Panel
description:
IndoorPanel is a game made with java using libgdx project setup. This is an entry for Mini Jam 98.

Gameplay:

The game is topdown tilebased roguelike and breakout-like game which also turnbased.

Objective:

Get the ball to one of the door to go to the next room. The game will be over if the ball falls into a hole or moved out of the map.

Control:

W A S D: to move the panel.
